items.checkin_comment: Can definitely taste the sweetness. A good beer to end on.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 70)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 71!

items.checkin_comment: Not really picking up as much of the advertised dry hop flavors. I'm picking up more of the roasty and chocolatey notes. As it warmed up I was getting a little more of the smoke note mentioned.
